description.value:
A viscious milk that coats the throat against toxins. Provides +20 to tests to resist ingested poisons for 1d5 hours. After drinking make Toughness Test or suffer 1 Permenant Toughness Damage. Can also degrade the user's sense of taste.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 75 T
